$schema.description: JSON schema reference for the config file.

mainEntrypoint.description: Entry file for the circuit project.

previewComponentPath.description: Optional component path used for previews.

siteDefaultComponentPath.description: Default component path to show in generated static sites.

includeBoardFiles.description: File globs to include as board files.

buildCommand.description: Override command used for cloud builds.

kicadLibraryEntrypointPath.description: Entry file for KiCad footprint library generation.

kicadLibraryName.description: Name for the generated KiCad library. Falls back to package.json name, then directory name.

alwaysUseLatestTscircuitOnCloud.description: Always use the latest TSCircuit version when building on the cloud.

circuitJson.description: Enable circuit JSON output in build.

kicadLibrary.description: Enable KiCad library output in build.

kicadPcm.description: Enable KiCad PCM (Plugin and Content Manager) assets output in build.

previewImages.description: Enable preview image outputs in build.

typescriptLibrary.description: Enable TypeScript library output in build.
